div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: Advance Students, Parents, and Community Members,

We are moving through uncharted waters during this time of COVID-19. After gathering information from local health officials, as well as listening to parents and community leaders, we have decided to cancel school beginning Wednesday March 18th - Friday April 3rd. We will be in session Tuesday, March 17. The District will use the next few days for the purposes of cleaning and planning. There will be no school events or activities of any kind during this school closure. All school facilities will be shut down during this time. Activities will be rescheduled when possible.

We realize the hardship being out of school places on families. We are developing a plan to assist our families during this time. We will use all communication channels to alert families about how to access these resources in the coming days. We will provide frequent updates via the District website, texts, emails, and social media.

The safety of our students, staff, and community is our highest priority. We will continue to evaluate the next steps for our school as information becomes available and provide information through our all channels of communication.
Questions that we cannot answer answer at this time:
1. We do not know if we will have to make these days up.
2. We do not know what this means for seniors and graduation.
3. We do not know what this means for testing.
As we know more information we will pass it along.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

em.strong: It is the mission of the Advance R-IV School District to ensure that all students acquire the knowledge, skills, and abilities necessary to participate in an ever-changing society. This will be accomplished by ensuring that each child has access to appropriate and meaningful learning experiences to meet the demands of the 21st century. It is, therefore, the responsibility of the Advance R-IV School District to provide an educational environment for children of the district which will foster and accelerate their moral, intellectual, physical, social, emotional, and career development.
